titles.title: Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct

bill.summary: 1/22/2009--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects certain named Majority Members to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, including the Chairman.
